Record.ClassificationPath: Stomatognathic Diseases/Jaw Diseases/Periapical Diseases/Periapical Periodontitis/Periapical Abscess
Stomatognathic Diseases/Mouth Diseases/Periodontal Diseases/Periodontitis/Periapical Periodontitis/Periapical Abscess
Stomatognathic Diseases/Mouth Diseases/Periodontal Diseases/Periapical Diseases/Periapical Periodontitis/Periapical Abscess
Record.Description: Acute or chronic inflammation of tissues surrounding the apical portion of a tooth, associated with the collection of pus, resulting from infection following pulp infection through a carious lesion or as a result of an injury causing pulp necrosis. (Dorland, 27th ed)
